original_text: Then the angel of the Lord went ahead and stood in a narrow place, where there was no way to turn either to the right or to the left.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 더 나아가서 좌우로 피할 데 없는 좁은 곳에 선지라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord went ahead
and stood in a narrow place
where there was no way to turn either to the right or to the left
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 오른쪽이나 왼쪽으로 돌아갈 길이 없었습니다
